price: Na Ishara hiyo kwao - ardhi iliyo kufa, nasi tukaifufua, na tukatoa ndani yake nafaka, wakawa wanazila!
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: Na dalili kwao ya uweza wetu wa kufufua ni kuangalia vipi ardhi yenye ukame tunavyo ihuisha kwa maji, na kutoa ndani yake nafaka wanazo zila.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-arḍu al-maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā min'hā ḥabban famin'hu yakulūna
